#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

const int MAX = 1e5 + 10;
int test, n, m, cnt[MAX], pos;
char s[MAX], t[MAX];

int main(){
    //freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    scanf("%d", &test);
    gets(s);
    for (int ii = 1; ii <= test; ++ii){
        gets(s);
        n = strlen(s);
        gets(t);
        m = strlen(t);
        int k = 0;
        for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j)
        if (s[j] != ' ')
            s[k++] = s[j];
        s[n = k] = '\0';

        k = 0;
        for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j)
        if (t[j] != ' ')
            t[k++] = t[j];
        t[m = k] = '\0';

        cnt[0] = -1;
        cnt[1] = 0;
        pos = 0;
        for (int  i = 1; i < m; ++i){
            while (pos > -1 && t[pos] != t[i])
                pos = cnt[pos];
            cnt[i + 1] = ++pos;
        }

        pos = 0;
        int res = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i){
            while (pos > -1 && t[pos] != s[i])
                pos = cnt[pos];
            if (++pos == m){
                ++res;
                pos = cnt[pos];
            }
        }

        printf("Case %d: %d\n", ii, res);
    }
    return 0;
}
